Package Models

Class Player

java.lang.Object
Models.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements Serializable
This model class manages all the players in the game.
Version:
3.0.0
Author:
Sumit Sharma, Muhammad Adnan Asad, Pranaykumar Chauhan, Darshansinh Dilipsinh Devda, Dhruvkumar Parmar, Dhruv Patel
See Also:

    • issue_order

      public void issue_order(IssueOrderPhase p_issueOrderPhase) throws InvalidCommand, IOException, InvalidMap
      Issues an order on behalf of the player.
      Parameters:
      p_issueOrderPhase - current phase of the game
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - indicates map is invalid
      InvalidCommand - indicates command is invalid
      IOException - indicates failure in I/O operation

    • checkDeployArmyCount

      public boolean checkDeployArmyCount(Player p_player, String p_noOfArmies)
      Checks if a player has enough unallocated armies to perform a deployment action.
      Parameters:
      p_player - The player whose army count is being checked.
      p_noOfArmies - The number of armies to be deployed (as a String).
      Returns:
      true if the player has enough unallocated armies for deployment, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException - If the provided p_noOfArmies parameter cannot be parsed as an integer.

    • initDeployOrder

      public void initDeployOrder(String p_command)
      Initializes a deployment order for a player, given a deploy command.
      Parameters:
      p_command - The deploy command entered by the player.

    • initAdvanceOrder

      public void initAdvanceOrder(String p_commandEntered, GameState p_gameState)
      Handles the initialization and processing of the advance command entered by the player.
      Parameters:
      p_commandEntered - command entered by the user
      p_gameState - current state of the game

    • areCountriesAdjacent

      public boolean areCountriesAdjacent(GameState p_gameState, String p_sourceCountry, String p_targetCountry)
      Checks whether two countries are adjacent or not.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - current state of the game
      p_sourceCountry - source country name
      p_targetCountry - target country name
      Returns:
      boolean true if countries are adjacent or else false

    • allocateCard

      public void allocateCard()
      This method will allocate a random card from the available set to the player when they successfully conquer a territory.

    • removeCard

      public void removeCard(String p_cardLabel)
      Eliminate the card that has been utilized.
      Parameters:
      p_cardLabel - name of the card to remove.

    • initiatePlayerNegotiation

      public void initiatePlayerNegotiation(Player p_playerToNegotiate)
      Initiates a player negotiation with another player.

      This method adds the specified player to the list of players with whom negotiations have been initiated.

      Parameters:
      p_playerToNegotiate - The player with whom negotiation is being initiated.

    • resetNegotiation

      public void resetNegotiation()
      Clears all negotiation from the previous turn.

    • checkCardCommands

      public boolean checkCardCommands(String p_receivedCommand)
      Checks the validity of the card parameters.
      Parameters:
      p_receivedCommand - command of card
      Returns:
      bool if valid

    • handleCardActions

      public void handleCardActions(String p_receivedCommand, GameState p_gameState)
      Manages the Card Commands: organizes and includes them in the list.
      Parameters:
      p_receivedCommand - command entered
      p_gameState - gamestate instance
